name: Davidduc's Apartment Quang Khanh
address: 41 Quang Khanh, Alley 12 Dang Thai Mai, Quang An, Tay Ho, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Davidduc's Apartment Quang Khanh offers pet-friendly accommodation in Hanoi. The apartment is 600 metres from Phu Tay Ho. Free WiFi is available .

There is a seating area and a kitchen. A flat-screen TV is featured.

West Lake is 2 km from Davidduc's Apartment Quang Khanh, while Tran Quoc Pagoda is 2.3 km away. Noi Bai International Airport is 17 km from the property.
